      Returns:
      The created signature

    • signData

      public byte[] signData(Signature signature, byte[] bytesToSign) throws SignatureException, InvalidKeyException, KeyStoreException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, UnrecoverableKeyException
      Parameters:
      signature - used to sign the data
      bytesToSign - the bytes to sign
      Returns:
      the signature of the data
      Throws:
      SignatureException - If the signature cannot be created
      InvalidKeyException - If the key is invalid
      KeyStoreException - If the keystore is invalid
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the signature algorithm does not exist
      UnrecoverableKeyException - This exception is thrown if a key in the keystore cannot be recovered.

    • loadPublicKey

      protected final PublicKey loadPublicKey() throws KeyStoreException
      Returns:
      the public key loaded from the certificate
      Throws:
      KeyStoreException - if the keystore is invalid

    • verifyData

      public boolean verifyData(Signature signature, byte[] bytesToVerify, byte[] bytesSignature) throws InvalidKeyException, IOException, SignatureException, KeyStoreException
      Parameters:
      signature - used to verify the data
      bytesToVerify - data to check against the signature
      bytesSignature - if the data is encoded then will contain the decoded data
      Returns:
      true if the signature verifies the data
      Throws:
      IOException - If the signature cannot be updated
      SignatureException - If the signature cannot be created
      InvalidKeyException - If the key is invalid
      KeyStoreException - If the keystore is invalid
